column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''27''' is the twenty-seventh issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "''In a Hole in the Ground There Lived a Marbit'': A Brief Report on ELFCon III" — Patrick Wynne.
* "Trees of Silver and of Gold: A Guide to the Koivienéni Manuscript" — Patrick Wynne and [[Christopher Gilson]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
